comment: /**  * Copies a blob to a local file.  *  * @param jobId     ID of the job this blob belongs to (or <tt>null</tt> if job-unrelated)  * @param blobKey   The blob ID  * @param localFile The local file to copy to  *  * @return whether the file was copied (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>)  * @throws IOException If the copy fails  */
code: /**  * Copies a blob to a local file.  *  * @param jobId     ID of the job this blob belongs to (or <tt>null</tt> if job-unrelated)  * @param blobKey   The blob ID  * @param localFile The local file to copy to  *  * @return whether the file was copied (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>)  * @throws IOException If the copy fails  */ boolean get(JobID jobId, BlobKey blobKey, File localFile) throws IOException.
